DOC.brief_summary: We investigate impact duloxetine ( `` Cymbalta '' ) , serotonin norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor , pain total knee arthroplasty ( TKA ) . Specifically , investigator determine whether duloxetine , 60 mg daily 2 week , reduces pain score 2 week TKA .
DOC.brief_title: Does Duloxetine Reduce Sub-Acute Pain After Knee Arthroplasty ?
